Privacy Policy

Last updated:

Overview

Elixiary respects your privacy. This page explains what we collect and how we use it.

Information we collect

  • Basic analytics (page views, device, region) to improve the site. We do not sell personal data.
  • Content you voluntarily send us (e.g., emails via the contact page).

Cookies

We use local storage for performance (e.g., caching list pages). No advertising cookies.

Data sharing

We do not share personal data with third parties, except service providers strictly needed to run the site (hosting, CDN).

Your choices

You can request deletion of any information you sent us. Contact: /contact.

Changes

We may update this policy. We’ll update the date at the top of this page.
